Question.Subject: How do i delete a firefox's drop down search bar and address bar?
Question.Content: there are a few sites that i don't want people that use my pc to know about and i want to know how to delete those drop down search bars history and the sites that i have visited on my address bar. how do i do it and thanks i guess
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Click Tools >>then Options
When the window opens choose the PRIVACY Tab
Untick Remember search and form History
then at the bottom
When using the location bar >>Change this to NOTHING

Answer.Content:
Click Tools >>then Options
When the window opens choose the PRIVACY Tab
Untick Remember search and form History
then at the bottom
When using the location bar >>Change this to NOTHING
Tools> Clear Recent History. With the latest version of Firefox you can choose private browsing.
